item.title: MJ add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description:
"You may not remember the time you let me go first. Or the time you dropped back to tell me it wasn't that far to go. Or the time you waited at the crossroads for me to catch up. You may not remember any of those, but I do and this is what I have to say to you:
Today, no matter what it takes, we ride home together." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "If there's just one kind of folks, why can't they get along with each other? If they're all alike, why do they go out of their way to despise each other? Scout, I think I'm beginning to understand something. I think I'm beginning to understand why Boo Radley's stayed shut up in the house all this time. It's because he wants to stay inside." -- Harper Lee

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I was born good but had grown progressively worse every year. Scout" -- Harper Lee

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Bad language is a stage all children go through, and it dies with time when they learn they're not attracting attention with it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "It’s never an insult to be called what somebody thinks is a bad name. It just shows you how poor that person is, it doesn’t hurt you." -- Harper Lee

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Things are always better in the morning." -- Harper Lee

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "There's a lot of ugly things in this world, son. I wish I could keep 'em all away from you. That's never possible." -- Harper Lee

item.title: MJ add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Courage is not a man with a gun in his hand. It's knowing you're licked before you begin but you begin anyway and you see it through no matter what. You rarely win, but sometimes you do." -- Harper Lee
